website_summaries.verdict: This table stands out for wearing well and having a beautiful scratch-resistant finish.
pros: Owners report that this table stands the test of time, resisting nicks, scratches, and moisture
It's praised for its rich look, and we love that it comes with extra storage because of its drawers
cons: A few felt that the pieces didn't line up exactly during assembly which made it a bit more difficult, and some received damaged pieces

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: My bed sits of very high, so I was concerned they would stand to short or look small in comparison to the King sized bed. Not the case!
customer_reviews.author: clayton

customer_reviews.title: For fifty one dollars, its five stars!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two espresso color ones for the living room and they really are nice for the price. I don't know why all the haters are giving it one star. It's actually a nice piece of furniture! Everyone compliments them and when I told them how cheap they were, they were surprised. Putting together took about 45 minutes for the first one and 30 minutes for the second (since I knew what I was doing the second time around! The packing was good and had no chips on it whatsoever. The color is dark espresso, which I can't figure out why they are saying it isn't. its beautiful! Check out my pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Made of wood, yes, but very very thin pieces of wood.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to use for nightstands in our master bedroom Our room is kind of small and i liked them for the size. They go together easily but seem a bit flimsy for the price. Since I'm 75 I expect they'll last as long as I do, but won't be passing them down to our kids as great furniture. I was QUITE DISAPPOINTED to discover the back piece of one nightstand has big gash in it - but it doesn't show cuz its in the back and it woud be more trouble to return it than it's worth. They'll do, but I'm not thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mulherin

customer_reviews.title: It was fairly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: For those unwilling/unable to spend on a higher end unit, this one will suffice. It was fairly easy to assemble. The hardest part was the drawer alignment but entirely doable as a solo job. The materials were exactly as described so I was content with this purchase. I'm using this as a nightstand. My diffuser is stored on top with my essential oils in the sliding drawer and my distilled water jug in the bottom section. It has room for other things but as of yet, I haven't decided what all will be stored. Probably a book or two and the remote for the lights once I get that installed.
customer_reviews.author: Social_CB

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS GARBAGE PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it 0 stars, I would. This is the the worst, most ridiculous product I have ever purchased from Amazon.com. I never have a problem assembling DIY furniture items and I'm not sure why this one would be any different, except that only a few of the pre-drilled holes line up correctly. One of the pieces that is supposed to hold the drawer in place is misshapen altogether. The product arrives neatly packed, but for some reason the varnish is damaged in several places. The first time I opened the door it cracked the wood hinge. I can't believe a product like this is even on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose, isn't overwhelmingly cheap, and looks ok.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a room full of Raymor and Flannigan furniture, look elsewhere. This is in our family TV room between two recliners. We needed a catchall to store our glasses, kindles, remote controls and other family room miscellany. It serves the purpose and it actually looks fine. Not outstanding, but fine. It has to be assembled and the instructions were not real specific but adequate. I can't be bothered with assembling furniture but my husband tackled it on his own in about a half an hour. Everything fit perfectly and the drawer slides in and out smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Assemble and then NEVER MOVE AGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: This piece of furniture looks really good, when assembled, and is relatively easy to assemble. However, unless you are going to go through the trouble of constructing it, while also using wood glue, then once you place it, do not ever move it again. I recently tried to move it--just to sweep behind it--and it broke! The bottom fell out, and one of the joints actually broke. It is very handsome, but extremely un-sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Greggory Cartier-Esquire Ashworth III

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build, looks good, lighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of the Eugene Accent table (Espresso) and got exactly what I expected. Assembly was simple, about 10 minutes each. Loved the one-size-for-everything screws, the front door was already hung in place, back piece comes already assembled so for anyone confused, do the following: Attach the back to top, Panel rails under top hold in the side panels, Add "bottom" rails to side panels, screw to back side, Add center supports, instructions show where, Build the drawer per instructions, attach handles.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Berry

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I paid about $50 for this and am not disappointed. I don't expect the quality and weight of Amish craftsman for that price and free shipping. It took me about 15 minutes to put together and looks pretty good. If you push around on it, yea it rocks a bit on the joints, but a few well placed drops of wood glue in the grooves of the side panels should firm it up quite nicely. Like most kit-furniture, a small bit of glue and something to protect the finish can make them significantly better and longer lasting.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Solid top, but weak sides bottom.  Still worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: These tables are great for the money. Just realize that the sides and bottom boards are made out thin manufactured particle board/cardboard with a wood veneer that matches the stain of the wood parts. Because of this, it's not the most sturdy table. I purchased this for a spare bedroom. My bedrooms have Pottery Barn and Ethan Allen tables. I expect these to last 3-5 years...but that's not bad for $50. These assemble with a phillips head screwdriver, including the drawer. It should hold up pretty well if it's not moved or played on by kids.
customer_reviews.author: Spuds Benson

customer_reviews.title: Just flat out NO.
customer_reviews.text: This was a fail to say it nicely. Straight out the box a leg looked like it was broken and someone tried to glue it on. Didn't expect the sides to be made out of cardboard. Scratches on one side, and wood cut unevenly and incorrectly. Very poor craftsmanship and an 8th grade shop class would probably come out with something sturdier and nicer looking. For $50, hard pass. The item is worth $5 at best. I've been an Amazon customer for ten years, and have never had complaints about a purchase, and have never returned an item. This will be my first, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice accent table/nightstand!!!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly required. Some reviews knocked the sturdiness of these, so when I assembled mine I used wood glue. Let me inform you that sturdiness is a non-issue if you use wood glue. These look great after assembly and the color of the stain matched the espresso color of my existing bedroom furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap looking, which I guess goes with the price. You get what you paid for and I was expecting that. However when I put mine together I noticed that some of the front wood was damaged and they painted on top, not very noticeable in a dark place, but with the windows opened in the middle of the day, you can see that they just patched it up with some wood putty and paint. I complained to Amazon and they took care of it, but still not acceptable from the vendor. I'm fine with cheap when the price is right, but this was just trying to sell off damaged stuff as new!
customer_reviews.author: DiosmayaTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars
customer_reviews.text: Pieces look nice, but if you can't put it together, it's non functional and deserves zero stars. The screw head fell off while screwing in the bottom support! The screw was way too long compared to the hole that was drilled into the wood piece, which required me to use excessive force. I'm pretty weak, and I've never seen this happen before. I tried getting the screw out with the vice grip part near the handle of my pliers, but there's not enough friction and the metal grooves on the vice grip got obliterated. Note to Winsome, either use shorter screws, or drill your holes longer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, but good
customer_reviews.text: It arrived right on time. No missing pieces or damages. Everything fits together properly with no mis-made parts. I should have known based on the price that it would be very flimsy. The corner and frame parts screw together nicely and fairly sturdy, but the bottoms and sides (1/4 inch wooden sheets) are rattling around a lot, and I'm afraid to put too much weight on them. HOWEVER, for the price, and average use, it's pretty good! I wouldn't exceed 10lbs for fear of the bottom snapping.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not even worth 1 star. Another low quality item coming from China DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Biggest piece of junk I have ever purchased as far as furniture goes. Wood split just putting the screws in big piece of trash. I would rather have went to a 7 day furniture store at least the $60 would've been worth it. Very disappointed to put it litely. If I could use other words I would, worst product I've ever bought from Amazon and there's not many I haven't been happy with. This one takes the cake I want a refund for wasting my time and money most importantly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet and Petite
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because we needed another bedside table and the furniture line in our bedroom has been discontinued. I knew it was smaller than the nightstand on my hubby's side of the bed but I thought that darker finish would blend in with our existing furniture. My husband assembled it while I was cooking dinner. I heard only one or two swear words during assembly. That is a good thing. He is a numbers man not a furniture builder. The finished product is without mars and the drawer and cabinet open/close smoothly. It isn't particularly large but it is well-suited to my needs.
customer_reviews.author: DiHof

customer_reviews.title: Overall good but a couple flaws
customer_reviews.text: I just got this. This is a good solid item of furniture and well worth the price, but I have two complaints. First, the bottom, drawer bottom, and sides are made of thin, bendy fiberboard. That makes this completely unsuitable for books or other heavy items. Second, it had a scuff mark right out of the box. See pictures for both. It took me about 45 minutes to assemble, but I took it slow and careful, so maybe you’ll take less time. All the pieces were there. Directions were not great but it wasn’t that hard to figure out. It took a Phillips head screwdriver and a mallet.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Huge Disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars, I would. I have never been so disappointed with a piece of build it yourself furniture. It is flimsy, smells strongly of chemicals and nearly impossible to put together as the holes are not drilled properly. It looks very nice in the picture, but in person it looks beyond cheap. Badly sanded in many spots and not finished properly. I have spent a third of what it cost on better furniture from Dollar General. Save your money and time because unless I was unlucky enough to get a dud, you’ll be shipping it back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Reasonably Priced
customer_reviews.text: The only problem was that it took my husband two hours to put it together. But we are both very pleased with this beautiful table. It is just the right height for our printer and does not take up any unnecessary room. We have a small apartment and are slowly changing to the smaller furniture. I love that there is a drawer that can use for printer cartridges and other stuff that we don't use as often. The door fits perfectly and hides the file folders for future use. It looks like a fine piece of furniture and is very reasonably priced. That makes me want to try more of Winsome Wood Products.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pro: •it fits in very small spaces •Easy to assemble •great color •good quality for the price Cons: •the side walls and bottom are cardboard •didn’t give 5 starts because the legs were slightly uneven so I put a small piece of cardboard underneath one leg •Great price will last until I move again and won’t feel bad about throwing out
customer_reviews.author: Janell

customer_reviews.title: Great! Will do the job I need for the price I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Great item! I am happy with item as it serves the purpose that I needed as a bed side table for baby supplies for newborn in my room! Sturdy but not sure how much weight it would actually hold or how long it would last if you don’t treat it great. It’s up to you how you treat it, but good product for the price! Very satisfied! Will prob last me a long time or I can re purpose in office!
customer_reviews.author: SweetsGA

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Go buy the Amazon basics version of this nightstand. It's like 10$ more but the quality difference is absolutely worth it. This is made of paper thin press board. You can easily punch through it. When it's put together it's shaky and squeaks when you move it. Feels like it's going to collapse in on itself under any weight. The drawers don't sit even so everything looks lopsided.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Ok Side Table/Nightstand
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a side table in the entertainment room. Matches other furniture. It will hold up if you use it as intended. I use it for all the remotes, we have other places for the remotes, but this is now next to me and easily accessed. We also put our logs in the bottom. The people who say the drawers fall out did not use the little spacers that come with it. It keeps the drawers in place when you open them. Perfect for what I needed. We’re going to get a piece of glass for the top. I can see that this would easily scratch.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harriman

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This nightstand should be at least $20 less than what it is. The only thing I like about this nightstand is that it cost less than most that are out there and it's the perfect height next to my bed. It was easy to put together, but also had issues with it b/c the pieces just didn't fit well together. It's cheaply made. If you don't care about looks, I'd say get this only b/c it does the job. Also: the bottom of the drawer is made of thin, cheap "wood" [if you can even call it that], so I'd refrain from putting anything heavy on it.
customer_reviews.author: B Park

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality at Affordable Price!
customer_reviews.text: These end tables are the bomb. They are inexpensive, look rich enough once assembled to adorn a doctor or lawyer's office. If you follow the directions they are simple to assemble. You can see by the price what a bargain these are. My wife and I had a little bit of trouble assembling the first one for a simple reason....We didn't follow directions. The second one took about 15-20 minutes to assemble, and they look beautiful in our bedroom. We highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: RiverWisdom

customer_reviews.title: Attractive for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product is about what you would expect for the price. The finish is poor, there's no drawer stop to prevent the drawer from falling to the floor if you pull it out too far, and the side panels and shelves are pretty flimsy. It does fit the slot for which I purchased it, the finish flaws won't be visible to visitors, and it wasn't very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: tcg

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am generally very pleased with items I purchase on Amazon, but I was definitely disappointed with this one. There were multiple screw holes that were not lined up properly. The grooves for the side panels also did not line up correctly. There were also multiple chips in the wood on the legs and on the front that has obviously just been painted over to disguise them. I am using this for a spare bedroom that will really only hold a lamp and a clock so it should be sufficient. But the quality is definitely not up to par with what I usually receive from Amazon. Overall I'm disappointed and will not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Sargent

customer_reviews.title: Decent looking, though poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice enough from a distance, but is poor quality when you get closer. We often assemble things ourselves, but none of the holes were lined up with this piece. With the one hole that seemed to be lined up, we placed the screw and the moment we put on any pressure part of the base cracked. It is still functional, though I am worried about putting anything other than my lamp on it. We had donated our other bedroom set and wanted a color scheme change, which was the purpose for this purchase. I would recommend going with a higher quality end table.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice when assembled, but...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it two stars because, even with all its flaws, it looks nice once assembled. However, ours came in VERY poor condition. First, we had to gorilla glue multiple pieces back on because they were chipped off when we opened the box. Next, it was missing the covers for the screws. The pre-drilled holes were not the appropriate size and when putting the nails in they were immediately stripped so everything had to be glued together. it wobbles a lot, and we cannot put anything inside of it without the bottom falling out. Beautiful color and looks nice when assembled, but I will not be purchasing it again. Luckily, it was a very easy return process.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Nightstand, does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Its not a bad product! Has plenty of storage place, just keep in mind one is not able to place heavy belongings in the shelves for the board is very thin. Instructions were good but the plethora of individual pieces were not lettered and or numbered so it could be difficult to distinguish which part is which. Overall, decent product for the amount it costs. Good nightstand to hold alarm clock and light belongings.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J. Mata

customer_reviews.title: Okay product!
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price of $45 but it is not a very sturdy end table. I purchased it for a spare bedroom that is rarely used. The sides are a thin piece of panel about a 1/4 inch thick. The same style of panel is the used for the bottom of the table but there is no reinforcement across the middle. I think if you were to put something heavy in the door, it would not hold it. There were some scratches on the top of the table but not bad enough for me to send it back. It's an okay product. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: iloveshoppingonine

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two of them and I generally like them. They are not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of them and I generally like them. They are not sturdy, but they aren't flimsy, I would say they are adequate. The do have a real wood grain appearance to them and it's not some cheap wall-paper thin veneer. If it is a veneer then they used a decent quality veneer. The sides are not real wood, they are slim paste board, but since they are not exposed it's not a big deal to me. I don't expect them to last much more than a couple of years and I bought them at a sale price so I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, one rod split on me.
customer_reviews.text: These are well worth the money! There were a few dings in the wood but nothing major, and nothing a brown marker won't fix. The worst thing that happened during assembly happened as I was adding the last screw to attach the pack side of the table. The screw hole wasn't big enough so pressure built up and split the rod. It's not noticeable since that side sits against my wall. It was the last step of assembly so the table is still very sturdy. I added black/grey contact paper to the top of the table and inside the drawer ~ everything pictured, included the rose knobs were purchased in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer's Family

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think furniture could be made from materials this cheap
customer_reviews.text: Had I known this stand was made from such cheap material, I would never have purchased it. The sides and shelves are pretty much cardboard. The front-most, more substantial piece was broken upon arrival and had to be glued back together. My 12 year old child could have constructed a more sturdy piece of furniture. It's definitely not worth the price listed. I'd say it's worth $15, at most. I don't recommend purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Extremely DISAPPOINTED with the quality of the product and with costumer ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely DISAPPOINTED with the quality of the product and with costumer service. I ordered two of these end tables and once I started assembling the first one, I noticed many cosmetic issues with the product such as scratches and dings and the build quality was extremely poor. I noticed that the bottom door would not open without damaging the side. There was no stopper for the drawer. Fully assembled table felt really shaky. I really don't understand how it was being sold as Best Seller? When I contacted the customer service they offered some discount on damage item or gave me option to return the damage table after disassembling it that was not a pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.author: CuriousShopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I love my new night stand. The only thing I don't like is that the floor of the cabinet is very flimsy with little to no support. I was wanting to use that space to store bottled water, which you can, but to a limited extent. The floor bends with even four 500 ml bottles. The drawer works fine and won't fall out if you pull it all the way out.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Esparza

customer_reviews.title: Cheap assembly, busted at the joints.
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Shipping of the product was relatively fast. Night stand was very easy to put together, only hand tools are needed. It looks great and a nice price. Cons: Product is very flimsy, with only sheets of thin ply wood making up 50% of the product. My biggest issue is that after full assembly, The leg busted at the seam, prior to even bearing any weight. I have already put in the wooden plugs to cover up the screws, making removal and repair/return impossible. Hoping this can be resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Voulkiades

customer_reviews.title: High price for a low quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2. While I am happy with the price, they are not worth it. The only pro's is they are easy to assemble, they come with front and back already complete and while the top, front and back do feel like actual wood. The side panels are VERY thin particle board. As well as the bottom of the drawer and the bottom of the cabinet. Don't expect to put anything with too much heft. Some people on here are saying you can't put anything in there, this is very untrue it CAN hold a bit of weight. Just wouldn't recommend piling too much stuff in them. Raise the quality up a little is my recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: We received our product right on time thank you. We do have a couple of issues though. One there is a crack where there should not be a crack. It is not where we have screwed anything in. It came that way from the manufacturer. Also you can not tell by the picture but it had white dust all over down the right side of the table and when wiping it off took the finish off and left a distinct difference in the color of the table as well as taking off the finish. I would love this if it were not for these problems.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: One star selected just cause I had to put a star to submit the review. Total waste of time. Screws don't screw all the way into holes, so connections are not fitted and is just loose. Needless to say I was VERY DISAPPOINTED. I bought two, & the second piece was also defective. Holes for screws to go into were missing. The wood plugs didn't fit into not one hole. Just terrible & disappointing. I would have requested a replacement but I bought two. At least one of them could have been ok, but not at all. I couldn't risk wasting more time on another set that's defective.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, very low-quality.
customer_reviews.text: Without doubt one of the most cheap-flimsy pieces fo “furniture” I have ever seen. I got it to stage a house, and it is truly like a prop, not real furniture, and it came damaged, with an attempted repair with cheap off-color wood filler. I need it for a week to show a property, then I can pitch it. I’d return it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: James G Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I could use more of these beautiful, functional little tables. I will be getting more. These come in easy packing, and are easily put together. I highly reccommend these if you are looking for good looking furniture. They are surprisingly sturdy for not being completely wooden. They are easy to maintain as well. I will be purchasing more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C

customer_reviews.title: Looks fine from a distance & prepare yourself for some cuts
customer_reviews.text: The nightstand is not made with the best material. Some of the wood is chipped, and I cut my finger twice and got a splinter while assembling the nightstand. The shelves don’t seem very sturdy. I question that they can really hold 15lbs. It will serve its purpose and looks fine from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Fragile Product That Looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: This can easily be a 5-star product if it weren't for the shoddy quality and materials. I followed the directions to a T and there are still some parts that are crooked. It's a very fragile product but you can't tell when looking at it. It looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: hungrymanTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Piece of absolute crap - yes, for $50. It's not worth $10. Should have listened to the 1 star reviews
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it less stars I would. What an absolute piece of garbage - yes, even for like $50. It's not worth $10. One piece of it was completely broken off while the drawers were laughable at how stingy they are. They wouldn't hold a dang thing in that drawer. So not only is it a huge piece of crap but now I had to pack it all back in the box - which is just as much of a pain in the butt. Now I get to ship the crap back. Never again. And I have been a very happy and loyal Amazon customer for a decade. So unhappy and frustrated with this. A total waste.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: We have never had side tables and after 10+ years of marriage, we were sick of putting our phones on whatever was next to our bed. We moved into a new house and took a risk on these. We were very surprised that they work really well for what we want. Just don't expect full wood or solid shelves. They do look nice and hold our bedside lamps and chargers.
customer_reviews.author: JonTheCanadian

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but flimsy sides & bottom
customer_reviews.text: Looks great from the outside. Sturdy & quality front, back, top, & knobs However, the bottom cubbard base is only an 1/8" thick wobbly wood that'll cave in if you put something too heavy on it. Drawer isnt lined with brackets, bearings or a wheel to slide open & closed, rather basic, but it works. All in all, being blindsided by the paper thin wobbly composite wood, and worrying if the bottom cubbard base is gonna cave in on me, is making me wonder if I could've found something better for 5-10$ more
customer_reviews.author: berj

customer_reviews.title: Cute design, but wood split, had to be glued
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive finish for the price. Assembly wasn't that difficult. I was disappointed however, that even though there were pilot holes drilled into the wood pieces for assembly, two pieces split while hand tightening the screws into place. This can sometimes happen with an over-zealous power screwdriver, but hand tightening?! The wood split right along the grain line. One piece was just slightly split, but the other rather badly split. I managed to wood glue it into place and made do. This is going in a child's room as a nightstand. Hopefully, it will last long enough to make it worth the money, time, and effort. It's a very cute design.
customer_reviews.author: TXO

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality and Bad wood.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap wood and Bad Quality of product. I had ordered 2 nightstands after checking it’s popularity. Even though there are plenty of reviews about having poor quality I thought of giving it a try as I am not looking for some long term furniture. But after receiving this product I realized I won’t even keep this for short term. On the top if it one item was not well finished, seemed defective, I didn’t even bother to open another box of nightstand. I would rather buy something stronger in this same price range which are easily available at other places.
customer_reviews.author: Manju

customer_reviews.title: I bought this despite bad reviews because I was looking for an inexpensive nightstand ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this despite bad reviews because I was looking for an inexpensive nightstand and can deal with small nicks in the wood here and there. The product came with no instructions which I have never had happen before. I'm pretty good with assembling items so even though I was unhappy, I decided to wing it. Luckily before I got too far I decided to try to open the lower cabinet door and it won't open more than an inch due to the way it was glued together in production. It wasn't put together evenly so the door doesnt open at the hinge. I have never been unhappier with a purchase from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The product looks cheap. The top came scratched. I have moved and inadvertently used my old address and UPS would not return it or free so I had to have the new tenant forward it to me at cost of $43. So this table costed me almost $100 so even though I don't like it I can't afford to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok!!
customer_reviews.text: This nightstand is just ok. Nothing more. I don't think this will last long. Some of the pieces are not durable. More on the thin weak side. I will only put a small lamp on top. The drawer itself is not strong enough to hold a lot of things, but maybe couple small things. Nothing heavy. The larger door below the drawer arrived with the magnetic latch piece broken that keeps it closed. For the money ($40) I guess it's ok. Shouldn't be priced more than that. I think I will be looking for something more durable that will last longer in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Okay you guys... I’ve never really built or put together anything before so I bought this based on its reviews of being simple. Maybe it’s me, but I swear the wooden pegs are not the correct size and have caused the entire thing to be wobbly and incorrect. I have shoved some cardboard in the spaces that have gaps so I am able to use this, but omg! I swear those pieces were faulty. It’s pretty though, a good color but definitely has more of a reddish tint than I thought it would have. It’s one of the cheapest night stands I was able to find and perhaps it shows in some ways. But I still like it.
customer_reviews.author: BLZ

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: product as described including the color. was looking for a nightstand that was a little taller than average. this fits perfectly to our bed.
customer_reviews.author: Eunsol

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: SO cute. Some minor superficial blemishes, but overall GORGEOUS. Not very sturdy as the sides and bottom are flimsy, but the frame itself and the top are nice wood. SO easy to put together. Literally took me 40 minutes for both of the two I bought. For the price you get what you pay for, but I’m not complaining and am very excited to set them up beside my bed!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Burleigh

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these. For the price they aren’t bad. Easy to assemble. We only ran into one small issue, one of the wooden dowel plugs on both units would not fit properly without being slightly filed down due to the predrilled holes being slightly off center. One of the tables has a small but noticeable bad spot on the front of the door. (See picture) Nothing a furniture marker can’t fix. Overall, they seem pretty sturdy and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: CynthiaA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This product was surprisingly disappointing. I assumed it would be similar to IKEA because of price but it is significantly worse. The predrilled holes were not all drilled enough preventing the screws for fully advancing. One board split when installing a screw, before it was even tightened down. I have assembled several pieces of furniture in the past and this is by far the worst one.
customer_reviews.author: Sara W

customer_reviews.title: Cheap in a horrible way
customer_reviews.text: Well it is cheap so I didn't expect much. But some of the pre drilled holes are too short and if you force the screw in the wood splits so now I have to buy a drill?! Many of the pieces don't line up so there are gaps in some places and protruding pieces in others. The sides of the unit are incredibly thin and just slide in, not attached in any way. Reminds me of cheap IKEA. I have bought and assembled most of the furniture in my home and this actually doesn't even seem worth the $45 charged for it.
customer_reviews.author: Chanya Roye

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, so keep in mind how cheap these are. Having said that, once it's assembled you can't tell that it's that cheap unless you start knocking around on the cheapy sides. They (purchased 2) do exactly what we need and the height is just right for our high bed and the width is perfect for our small bedroom and the "wood color" is pretty! If you are looking for something cheap that is functional & looks nice, get these. If you are looking for high quality. Don't.
customer_reviews.author: Marie E. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy, great final result
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for the price. Most of the fiddle bits are already pre-assembled, so you just have to put the puzzle pieces together. Parts aren’t labeled, but it’s easy enough to figure out. Very happy with this product. Only downside is a few of the screw holes aren’t drilled well, and it can be very tricky tightening screws by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Howell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This chest is adequate, but that's all. The construction is quite flimsy, made of particle board and very thin strips of wood. The hinges and drawers are functional but not exactly precision craftsmanship. The finish is spotty and coarse in places. It's adequate for where we needed a small chest like this, but that's all. It's not a quality piece by any stretch. It's not even up to IKEA quality, frankly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Gray

customer_reviews.title: Lower Quality Craftsmanship But Okay - Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. It looks decent once put together. Has flaws (cracks, chips, discolorations) in the materials. It will suffice for now. Was able to purchase two because of the price. Next time, will shop for something of better quality that's already put together. Drawer seems sturdy. Will need to see how it holds up once items are placed inside. I don't regret the purchase now that it's put together BY SOMEONE ELSE.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: customer service good, great little accent table
customer_reviews.text: assembly wasn't hard but we were missing one piece to finish assembly. winsome customer service was easy but their shipping process was slow. got the part, it looks great in the guest room. i enjoy the how spacious the lower cabinet is. it looks great in our guestroom.
customer_reviews.author: TN Amazn Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but not regrettable either.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality. I ordered 2 and they both had inconsistencies in the stain and very small chips and one larger scratch. The glue showed through on the front pieces, but unless you're up close to it, like when I assembled it, you really don't notice them and they look quite attractive. Amazon gave me multiple options to help me feel satisfied, and I am. For the price, I didn't expect something really well built that would last generations or anything and as far as the blemishes, Amazon fixed that problem, so overall, I don't regret the purchase. They do look nice in my bedroom which is all I was really looking for.
customer_reviews.author: KatiesCreations

customer_reviews.title: VERY Poor Quality.  Flimsy.  Poor Construction.  Poor Fit.
customer_reviews.text: I will not be using this table. It is very flimsy and the quality is so low the screws and pilot holes did not line up, or were not drilled deep enough. Only one size screw used in assembly, so couldn't use the wrong screw. Sides and shelf are cardboard, similar to what you find on most drawer bottoms in cheaper furniture. Packed poorly as two pieces arrived chipped and cracked.
customer_reviews.author: JeffNJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for apartment, take it easy when building
customer_reviews.text: For the money this serves it's purpose and looks dent for an apartment. I wouldnt recommend using a power drill to assemble because I was able to start spliting the wood on two screws by hand tightening them. With some tape and wood glue I was able to build it as pictured. I had ordered 2 of these. The one was perfect, the other was the one with wood starting to split when screwed and also one of the legs were cut maybe 1/8" too short which I was and to fix with an adhesive foam tape.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant L.

customer_reviews.title: Front Panel a Disaster
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this in maple finish and it was the perfect side table that I was looking for. It’s not high end furniture by any means but it worked for what I needed...but when I ordered a second one (in Espresso) it arrived in far inferior condition! I had to pay $20 more for the color but a week later it was back down to the original price...which annoyed me even more. With COVID issues still in play, I’m still trying to figure out how to return it...not worth $70!
customer_reviews.author: Gina L

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, looks okay. Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: So this is definitely a cheap nightstand. And from far away, you really can’t tell. It’s not very sturdy and won’t hold up to a lot of moving. Mine came with noticeable damage on the door but I bought it for the wall side night stand so I won’t return it. But if it were going to be very exposed I probably would.
customer_reviews.author: Melody C Doughty

customer_reviews.title: The best side bed tables!
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't expecting much with these. I honestly just needed some much smaller side bed tables,. and i didn't want to spend a ton of money. I was truthfully expecting to "get what i paid for". Ummmm...i hit the jackpot! these are amazing!! I really love them. The doors open smooth, the bottom door is a magnet so it shuts nicely. They are even balanced and the cherry color is beautiful. I would certainly buy these again. But do note the size, as they are small.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley king

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used one - so wasn't surprised that a knob was missing -- not a big deal because I wanted to use different hardware anyway. Instructions were pretty easy - but I still managed to miss something and had to un-do and re-do about 3/4 through - operator error and so it took about 45 minute to put together. It's not unattractive -- functional - fits the small space I needed a table for - for 40.00 not unhappy, no regret.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice and easy
customer_reviews.text: 1. Putting them together was a snap, nice and easy. 2. Nice color, consistent finish. 3. Well made. 4. The sides that are not part of the frame are like thin compressed wood-like product? Like pressed wood but not. (This is my reason for a 4 review.) However, with that being said, I haven't had a single issue with them, I built them 5 months ago and today is like the first day I built them. They are working out nicely for what I needed them for and I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bedside table
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the size of this end table. As expected only the top, side frames , drawer and lower door are wood. The rest is particle board. I am using these for staging a house so they are perfect. Very easy to put together. I used a cordless drill and had no problems following the directions. A rubber mallet was needed to get the wooden screw covers to go into the holes. Overall very happy. I only gave 4 stars because the particle board is thin.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M LeGore

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, seems well built except the bottom plate is ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, seems well built except the bottom plate is thin flimsy particle board and fell through on both of the ones I bought. I bought some small L brackets to keep the bottom from falling out. So if you have some books or something moderately heavy it will most likely fall through without some reinforcement.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: The wood on the back panel has very large blemishes that look like they been patched
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with a significant gouge/scratch on the top - I would have returned it for a refund but we are just putting a bird cage on top of it anyway. And you have to pull the whole box and parts all apart before you can see if it's damaged - I didn't want to go thru the hassle of trying to put it all back together to return it. It's VERY frustrating to have paid $52 for something that's already damaged. The wood on the back panel has very large blemishes that look like they been patched. Two screws were missing when we went to put it together. It's junk, really. I should have listened to the other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: While not terrible, the overall quality of the product feels very cheap, thin boards make up the panels and I was terrified I would break them while building the product. However, once assembled it feels quite sturdy and it does the job well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Paix

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a while back for my mom, but she did not like it. She mentioned that it was not sturdy and that the door did not close so well. Also it ended up breaking on her in just a couple months. I say spend your money and get something better.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For forty dollars, they really are nice. I hastily bought 2 of these tables 3 days before my in-laws were coming to visit us for Christmas. I used them in my guest bedroom which rarely gets used. I am not sure how they would hold up for repeated everyday use but I am sure they would be fine. My husband assembled them in a couple of hours and I didn't hear any complaints about assembly. Would purchase again, definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Krusty Krab

customer_reviews.title: Fairly sturdy but the bottom shelf won't hold a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: 4.5 stars. I ordered the brown and note that the color is a deep, true brown. Very quick assembly - took me maybe 25mins for the first one and 10-15 for the second since I knew what i was doing. Everything was very well packaged. Fairly sturdy but the bottom shelf won't hold a lot of weight. The particle board is incredibly thin.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: For this price, these are decent quality and value. When we moved our new bedroom is more narrow than our last. I loved my huge 3 drawer nightstand but they just wouldn't fit. These fit perfectly. They were surprisingly easy to put together (I'm a middle aged woman with no particular assembly skills) and work fine.
customer_reviews.author: divinedsc

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how nice it is for the money. I expected an erector set, and I am not handy, but it was easy. It had several very noticeable scratches on the top, but since most of it will stay covered with things, I didn't care. It looks so much more expensive than it was.
customer_reviews.author: ge

customer_reviews.title: Came with a scratch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful end table but had a scratch at the bottom of the front piece. Tried to wipe and stain came off on the paper towel. I’ve tried to request a new front price from vendor but It is taking forever to get anywhere. Really disappointed. I hope yours doesn’t come with any scratches or defects!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Value - Happy With Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm a simple man, and I like simple furniture. I took a chance, and bought two of these for nightstands in my master bedroom. I am pleased with the purchase. Things that took a star away. 1. There were a few spots that looked 'rough' or dusty. Some of them wiped away, others did not. 2. On both of mine, the drawers get stuck just a bit. The furniture is so light that I have to hold it down when I open the drawer or it will tip over. 3. The side pieces, and the bottom, are not real wood. The pieces are very stiff imitation, and will be okay for the most part, but still not real wood.
customer_reviews.author: DayTripper

customer_reviews.title: Worth $50?
customer_reviews.text: To be frank, this product is cheap. When assembling it you can tell the wood is fragile and if you screw it just the wrong way it will break. That being said it provides the storage I needed and is a place for my lamp, candles etc to go. Initially when I put it in my room I thought it was a little small so measure to make sure you're getting a size you like. Assembly was fairly painless, not too many parts. I did end up using an electric screwdriver which helped a lot. Will I bring it to my next apartment? probably not. Does it work for now? yes.
customer_reviews.author: eronrox

customer_reviews.title: Works ok and is good for a small space.
customer_reviews.text: You pretty much for what they advertise. While I had ordered the Winsome brand for living room tables in the past and was impressed by the look and all wood look, this was a bit lower class particle board table, but still looks ok just nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: R.K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and great finish
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 of these assembled in about 30 minutes. Good quality, especially for the price. Carefully tighten the drawer screws or they will strip out the wood. Add a bit of glue to the screws and tighten until just snug... don't over-do it. The rest of the assembly, I was able to snug up the screws tight without any issue. These were a breeze to assemble, and have a great finish to them.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Larkins

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth $50! Disappointed in the quality of most furniture these days. Can’t find anything decent for a decent price. The sides and back are basically paper. Very thin and flexible. Not what I’m looking for in end tables. Since both of mine are already assembled, it’s too much of a headache to even return. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Lilyflower2714

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to match an expensive Thomasville bedroom set.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to match a Thomasville bedroom set. This was a nice alternative to the expensive version. We had one Thomasville nightstand and decided to look for a second. After a long search and not finding an exact match, decided to try this one. The color is very close. The quality is obviously not the same but that’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK..
customer_reviews.text: This side table looks pretty nice, beside the spots where it looks like something touched it while the stain/finish was drying.. the sides and bottom are made of really thin particle board.. about 1/8th of an inch thick.. I’m not expecting this to last very long, wouldn’t buy it again. We’ll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Crooked but worked for now
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together took me about 30min with a handheld Phillips head. When I put in the drawer at the end i noticed it was crooked. All of the screws where right where instructed. One of the bars holding the right side drawer wasn't long enough to reach both ends so it's hanging on by a thread. It's a temporary drawer till we get our new bedroom set, but wouldn't have been more upset about the crooked drawer of it were more permanent. In the pic you can see it hangs out on the right side and is tilted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these night stands.. 1 I've had for about 2 years and the bottom panel has caved in because of the weight of my stuff. ( which was just a few items I like to keep close to my bed) nevertheless I wish the bottom drawer was more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: so I didn't have great expectations. But they arrived in great condition
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for nightstands in my small bedroom. I knew that they didn't cost much, so I didn't have great expectations. But they arrived in great condition, and were fairly easy to assemble and went together as they should. The dimensions are accurate. The finished table is WAY better looking than I expected and they fit in perfectly in my room. They appear to be more expensive than they are. I would definitely recommend them to someone looking for an attractive and functional small end/accent table. Just keep in mind that they are not heavy well made long term furniture pieces, but they are sturdy, attractive and you can't beat them for the price you're paying!
customer_reviews.author: ActingTeacher

customer_reviews.title: YMMV  good and bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and had 2 totally different experiences. The first one was a total bust, the holes were not drilled correctly and so the drawer does not slide in and out correctly and I basically had to re-drill 2 holes to get another piece to work. Overall assembly time was almost an hour. The second one had a couple of minor scrapes, but was otherwise perfect and it only took me about 10 minutes to put it together. The problem here seems to be quality control. Overall, the product appears more sturdy than a similar Sauder product and slightly heavier. The wood tone is very nice and consistent through the whole product.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Reisig

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Comes together relatively easily but the construction is inherently less stable because the materials are cheap. The drawer is difficult to open and close since it is wood on wood, no gliders. The bottom cabinet works fine. It is front heavy since they doors and handles are on the front. so if you put a lot of weight in a drawer and then open the cabinet, be prepared to catch the cabinet from falling. Overall it is a fine nightstand if you are using it for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy W.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price.  Would order again.
customer_reviews.text: Decent little side tables for my bedroom. Holds my remotes and books and bedside knick knacks. Shipping was quick and it was simple to assemble. The wood is pretty flimsy and there were some scratches and smears on it, fresh out of the box. But not bad enough that i would take the time to have a replacement sent. All in all, if looking for a cheap but decent little table, i would order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: hollz

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this night stand today. I'm very disappointed. This unit is outrageously fragile, bad quality, the drawer doesn't have any safety mechanism to stop it from coming completely out be careful with your toes. I bought it for my kids and I'm considering returning all three of them because it would be a safety issue for them... I won't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are good end tables for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are good end tables for the price. The color is very rich. Although the units did not come with detailed instructions, I found them pretty easy to put together by studying diagrams. I must say that one table has incorrect / backward parts and could not be completed. And one had some grainy lines on the top. Thus, these do not get a 5-star rating. Yet Amazon was "johnny on the spot" and replaced them with no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for a kid’s room
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 9 year old son. I didn’t want to spend a lot of money since I know he’ll likely destroy it in a couple of years. It’s good for what we bough it for. However, it isn’t a nice solid piece of furniture. It also looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: MikeL

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied...
customer_reviews.text: This. I'm having trouble with... trying to decide what to do. Arrived in good condition. I was literally placing the last screw and one of the little support bars under the tops panel completely broke in half. And I also noticed on one of the other support bars, the screw busted through the side.. 😒 I love the table.. buuuutt. I already placed all of the wooden pegs to hide the screws and I'm just like, do I wanna try to take this whole thing apart to send back... it was so disappointing to put in all the hard work of assembly to have it break irreparably at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya McLendon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a cheap product. I've happened on some great inexpensive furniture on amazon, but this is not that. The wood had some damages that were very poorly puttied as pictured. I would not have spent more than 25 bucks on this had I known the quality. Regardless, it does the temporary job I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

product_meta.title: Winsome Eugene Accent Table, 18.9 inches, Espresso
feature_bullets: Rectangular end/accent table from Winsome Wood for living room or bedside use
Beech wood construction with warm espresso finish; slightly tapered legs
Equipped with 1 drawer and 1 single-shelf cabinet; round satin nickel knobs on drawer and cabinet door
Home assembly required; comes with necessary tools and hardware
Upon assembly, measures 19-inch wide by 15-inch deep by 25-inch high

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
